snippet.title: WorldBox - God Simulator Trailer
snippet.description:
WorldBox is an ULTIMATE god simulator and sandbox game. Create your own world or destroy it using different powers. Watch civilizations grow, form kingdoms, colonize new lands and sail to far continents. Towns will rebel, empires will fall. It's your choice to help or watch them fight.

Out now on Steam (PC/Mac/Linux)! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1206560/WorldBox__God_Simulator/

Play on Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mkarpenko.worldbox

Play on iOS: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/worldbox-god-sandbox/id1450941371?ls=1

More info: https://superworldbox.com

Join our discord: https://discord.com/invite/worldbox

.....................................
Credits:

Trailer Production by Andrii Zabolotnii:
https://www.behance.net/andriizabolotii

Trailer Artwork by Sonya Kuznetsova:
https://www.artstation.com/potatomato

Music by Chris Logsdon:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EowgiaYPZKc

0:00 Introcats, because everyone loves cats
0:29 Create worlds full of life
0:48 Unleash the chaos!
1:06 Embark on unstoppable fun!
1:32 Become the god in super WorldBox!
1:41 ~beeh
